Joan Veronica ChongLevel 1. FreshieAnswered on 10 Jul 2018Defensive REITs such as healthcare based REITs are one of my “go to”s. I prefer dividends and defensive sectors as compared to growth strategy stocks as well. 0 comments0
Luke HoLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 06 Jul 2018You'd probably take out options shorting the market, as well as parking it in bonds, gold and alternatives. Defensive sectors are also good. 0 comments0
